cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers

Interface I_MOAUtilities

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MOAClassifier, StreamAlgorithmTester

    public interface I_MOAUtilities
    The class I_MOAUtilities defines an interface for both static and stream classifiers to use the MOA API.
    Version:
    1.0, 05/02/13
    Author:
    Rob Lyon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ready() 
      boolean reloadStreams(java.lang.String testSetFilePath, java.lang.String trainSetFilePath)
      Reloads the test and training data stream used by the classifier.
      boolean reloadTrainingStreams()
      Reloads the existing training and testing data streams used by the classifier.

    • Method Detail

      • ready

        boolean ready()
        Returns:
        true if the classifier is able to begin classifying the ARFF data streams, else false.

      • reloadStreams

        boolean reloadStreams(java.lang.String testSetFilePath,
                      java.lang.String trainSetFilePath)
        Reloads the test and training data stream used by the classifier.
        Parameters:
        testSetFilePath - the path to the new test data set.
        trainSetFilePath - the path to the new training data set.
        Returns:
        true if loaded successfully, else false.

      • reloadTrainingStreams

        boolean reloadTrainingStreams()
        Reloads the existing training and testing data streams used by the classifier.
        Returns:
        true if loaded successfully, else false.
